locations.title: CLIFTON PARK
locations.address: 19 Clifton Country Rd, Clifton Park, NY 12065

eventPackages.title: PLAINSMEN PACKAGE - $140 per hour
details: If not golfing, up to 24 guests

eventPackages.title: ARNOLD PALMER PACKAGE - $240 per hour
details: VIP suite + Plainsmen Room (3 golf bays)

eventPackages.title: THE ULTIMATE PATIO PARTY - $150 per hour
details: Includes bay 5 for party set up
Dining tables and lounge seating with fire table

eventPackages.title: BUNKER TAKEOVER PACKAGE - Fill out form
details: Full facility, 6 total golf bays, including 2 enclosed suites, and indoor/outdoor seating areas

bays.name: VIP SUITE
details: Our largest private room at over 800sq feet with 18’ wide screen and an extra-large lounge space with two plush couches, a table, two comfy chairs, and bar-style seating with six stools
Two 75” LED TVs and choice of music genre

bays.name: PLAINSMEN ROOM
bays.detail: Large private room with two golf bays!
details: Accommodates up to 10 guests if anyone is golfing; up to 24 if no one is golfing; a perfect space for large parties
You can dedicate one bay for golfers and use the other bay for party space
Features two widescreen hitting bays and two comfortable lounge spaces, each with a plush couch, table, and two comfy chairs
Each bay has its own 75” LED TV
Each bay can also be booked by itself for a semi-private party

bays.name: BAY 3
details: This is a “social” bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar-style seating for golfers
Two 75” LED TVs are in view
For large parties, Bay 3 can be combined with Bay 4 or the VIP Suite

bays.name: BAY 4
details: This is a “social” bay open to the bar area and right in the middle of the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar-style seating for golfers
Two 75” LED TVs are in view
For large parties, Bay 4 can be combined with Bay 3 and/or Bay 5

bays.name: BAY 5
details: This is a “social” bay with a direct view of the bar area
Bay 5 also features a private outdoor patio (Accommodates up to 25 guests) with a firepit; the garage door goes up when weather permits
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar-style seating for golfers
Two 75” TVs in the bar are in view
For large parties, Bay 5 can be combined with Bay 4

bays.name: DART ROOM
details: Interactive darts (steel tips) make this space fun for everyone. Get ready to share the video of each game winner on your social media!
Features one Interactive Darts Bay, plus bar style seating for 5 and cocktail seating for 5
The Dart Room can also be booked with any other Private Room or Bay to create awesome hospitality room for your party guests

eventPackages.title: JOHN DALY PACKAGE — $350 per hour
details: Room for table set-up & party favors

eventPackages.title: BUNKER TAKEOVER PACKAGE - Fill out form
details: Full facility, including 5 golf bays and bar

bays.name: BAY 1
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers (right handed players only)
For larger parties bay 1 can be combined with bays 10 and 18 along with exclusive access to our entire bar/lounge area

bays.name: BAY 10
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties bay 10 can be combined with bays 1 and 18 along with exclusive access to our entire bar/lounge area

bays.name: BAY 18
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties bay 18 can be combined with bays 1 and 10 along with exclusive access to our entire bar/lounge area

bays.name: DUTCHMEN ROOM
details: Private room with an 18’ wide screen, extra-lounge space with plush couches
Choose your own music genre and a call switch for exclusive butler service

bays.name: VIP SUITE
details: Our largest private room with an 18’ wide screen with a 75” LED TV along with plush lounge seating
Choose your own music genre and a call switch for exclusive butler service

locations.title: NORTH GREENBUSH
notices: WE HAVE LIMITED PARKING ON SITE.
In the event that our parking lot is full, please park on the two nearby side streets, Bloomingrove Drive or Ludlow Lane.

bays.name: VIP Suite
details: Our biggest private room at over 800 sq feet with 18' wide screen and an extra-large plush lounge space with two couches, a table, two chairs, and a bar seating with six stools
The VIP Suite is on the upper floor near the bar area, so everyone gets a peek at the high-rollers!
Two 75" LED TVs and choice of music genre

bays.name: Blue Devil Room
details: Private room features a wide screen bay and plush lounge space with a couch, a table, and two chairs
The Blue Devil Room is on the upper floor near the upper bar area, so everyone gets a peek at the high rollers!
75” LED TVs and choice of music genre

bays.name: Viking Room
details: Private room features a wide screen bay and plush lounge space with a couch, a table, and two chairs
The Viking Room is located on the lower floor and behind the bar area, making it our most private event space available
Two 75” LED TVs and choice of music genre

bays.name: Bay 1
details: Located on the lower floor, this is our larger semi-private “social” bay open to the lower bar, and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar-style seating for golfers
Two 75” LED TVs are in view
Includes interactive games including Bowling, Baseball, Soccer, and Disc Golf
For large parties, when Bay 1 is combined with neighboring Bay 5, the area between the two bays with a poker table becomes your space too

bays.name: Bay 3
details: Located on the lower floor, this is a larger “social” bay open to the lower bar, and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and comfortable lounge space with a plush couch, table, and two comfy chairs
For large parties, Bay 3 can be combined with neighboring Bay 4

bays.name: Bay 4
details: Located on the lower floor, this is a larger “social” bay open to the lower bar, closest to the bar, and in the middle of the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar-style seating for golfers
Two 75” TVs in the bar are in view
For large parties, Bay 4 can be combined with neighboring Bay 3 and/or Bay 5

bays.name: Bay 5
details: Located on the lower floor, this is a larger “social” bay open to the lower bar, and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge-style seating for golfers

eventPackages.title: VIP PACKAGE - $100 per hour
details: 16' wide hitting screen with private lounge personalized music, butler servive

bays.name: HOLE 1
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties hole 1 can be combined with hole 2

bays.name: HOLE 2
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties hole 1 can be combined with hole 2

bays.name: HOLE 3
details: This is a private bay closed off to the public with customizable music
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
This hole has sliding doors for easy access to adjacent bays for larger events and parties

bays.name: HOLE 4
details: This is a private bay closed off to the public with customizable music
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
This hole has sliding doors for easy access to adjacent bays for larger events and parties

bays.name: HOLE 5
details: This is a private bay closed off to the public with customizable music
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
This hole has sliding doors for easy access to adjacent bays for larger events and parties

bays.name: HOLE 6
details: Private room features a wide screen bay and plush lounge seating with a couch, a table, and two chairs
Hole 6 also features a garage door goes up when weather permits
75" LED TV and choice of music genre
For large parties, Hole 6 can be combined with neighboring Hole 5 by opening the sliding door

bays.name: SPARTAN ROOM
details: One widescreen hitting bay with lounge style seating
Personalized music and call switch for exclusive butler service

bays.name: VIP SUITE
details: Our largest private room with an 18’ wide screen with extra-lounge space and plush couches to guests to gather
Choose your own music genre and watch your favorite teams play on our 75” LED TV’s

eventPackages.title: The Harborside Takeover - Fill out form
details: Takeover HALF of the entire Mohawk Harbor Bunker, inside and out!

eventPackages.title: The Total Takeover - Fill out form
details: The ENTIRE Mohawk Harbor Bunker is yours for an event that your guests will be talking about for long after your event is over

bays.name: PLAYERS ROOM
details: Private room with an 18’ wide screen with extra-lounge space and plush couches to guests to gather
The Players Room can be booked with our VIP Darts room for the ultimate party space

bays.name: VEGAS ROOM
details: Private room with an 18’ wide screen with an 18' wide screen with extra-lounge space and plush couches for guests to gather

bays.name: VIP DARTS
details: Private room with two steel tip dart boards
If you’re looking for golf The VIP Darts room pairs nicely with bay 2 or the Players Room if you want a more private space

bays.name: BAY 1
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties Bay 1 can be combined with Bay 2

bays.name: BAY 2
details: This is a 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties Bay 2 can be combined with Bay 1

eventPackages.title: The Superfecta - $300 per hour
details: Up to 24 guests with golf, up to 80 guests without golf

eventPackages.title: The Winners Circle - $320 per hour
details: Bays 5/6, 3 golf bays and 2 Dart Bays (The Kimball + VIP Suite)
Up to 36 guests with golf, up to 50 guests without golf

eventPackages.title: The Ultimate Cocktail Hour - $400 per hour
details: 3 golf bays, 2 dart boards, and exclusive access to the bar lounge

eventPackages.title: The Broadway - $1000 per hour
details: All of the luxury of our VIP Suite, dart bays and bar and lounge
Up to 50 guests with golf, up to 70 guests without golf

eventPackages.title: The Full Mezz - $1200 per hour
details: Takeover the mezzanine floor of The Bunker Saratoga Springs overlooking Congress Park
Closed to Public, Exclusive use of entire top floor
Up to 75 guests with golf, up to 150 guests without golf

bays.name: BAY 1
details: A 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties Bay 1 can be combined with Bay 2, 3 and/or 4!

bays.name: BAY 2
details: A 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties Bay 2 can be combined with Bay 1, 3 and/or 4!

bays.name: BAY 3
details: A 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and bar style seating for guests and golfers
For larger parties Bay 3 can be combined with Bay 1, 2, and/or 4!

bays.name: BAY 4
details: A 'social' bay open to the bar and near the action
Features a widescreen hitting bay and lounge style seating for guests and golfers
Bay 4 has access to outside with sliding glass doors that open up when weather permits
For larger parties Bay 4 can be combined with Bay 1, 2, and/or 3!

bays.name: VIP SUITE
details: Private room with an 18’ wide screen, 2 dart boards (steel tips) and extra-lounge space with plush couches to gather
Located on the second floor with views of Broadway and Congress Park
The VIP suite can be booked with our upstairs bar/lounge to accommodate 50 guests
The VIP Suite can also be booked with The Kimball Room for an extra two golf screens for the ultimate party

bays.name: THE KIMBALL ROOM
details: You can dedicate one bay for golfers and use the other bay for party space
Features two widescreen hitting bays along with a comfortable lounge with couches and bar style seating
Each bay can be booked by itself for a semi private party
The Kimball Room pairs nicely with the VIP Suite for a private gathering of up to 35 guests

eventPackages.title: Mezzanine Takeover - $500 per hour
details: High top and low top seating

eventPackages.title: Triple Bogey - $180 per hour
details: Can be paired with the VIP Duo

gallery.value: We had a great time! The guys that helped us all night were amazing! We wouldn’t change a thing and will definitely be back! Great job!
Everything was perfect. Your staff were very helpful and professional. It was a fun afternoon of team building for our group. We will definitely keep you in mind for future events.

We had a blast at the bunker last night. Everyone was very kind and helpful. You have lovely staff. Please let them know that we appreciated everything they did. We can’t wait to come back and enjoy again.

I can’t find enough words to tell you how wonderful last night was. The space was incredible but even more important - your staff was remarkable. Please know how wonderful each of them were to us. I would recommend this to everyone for their events. Our 50 guests raved about it and I think you can count on some brand new customers returning soon.

testimonials.quote: We had a fantastic time, everything was well organized and the food was delicious! Our servers were extremely helpful as well. We will definitely consider The Bunker going forward for any employee events. it was a areat time!
Your team was phenomenal!!!! The service, the food, the experience - all top notch. I look forward to having more events there.
We had a great time and your staff was amazing as always. It was my second time hosting a party in that space and I just love it.
I couldn't have asked for a better experience for my family. The facility is clean and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The food was great!
We had such a good time last night, everyone loved the food, and the staff was phenomenal. We will definitely be coming back!
The wait staff was amazing and so kind and available to help in any way. The food was so delicious and perfect!

testimonials.message: A HUGE THANK YOU to you and your team at the Bunker! My team had an EXCELLENT time! The food and service were wonderful, as was the atmosphere! You were also so easy to work with and the chef was so kind to make all of our dietary requests. We will absolutely be back to visit in the future and I will pass your information on to my colleagues local to our East Greenbush office. Thanks again!
Everything was great and our bartender, Anthony, was exceptional! He went above and beyond.
It worked out perfectly, the options of food/drink, the activities and the venue– our entire group had a great time and Max at the bar was awesome! Thanks so much, you were very easy to work with!

Thank you so much! Our team and clients had a fantastic time! The staff were SO friendly and helpful and the food was delicious. We appreciate everything and will highly recommend The Bunker to everyone we know!

Thank you again for all of your help! There is absolutely nothing I would have changed everything was perfect! The food was great, your servers were all incredible in the room and at the bar, and everyone had an amazing time. We will definitely be back again!

Thank you so much for all of your help booking our party, everyone had a great time! Your staff was great, and even though it was a super busy night everyone was very attentive and helpful.We’ll definitely be back!
Everything was great, both Friday and Sunday! Thank you guys so much for everything and FABULOUS customer service!
I will let Sean's wife Lisa say it best... Yesterday was an amazing memory that Sean and our family will never forget!!❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️

Thanks for your outreach and warm message. We had a wonderful time yesterday at the event. Everything was exceptional from the food, the service, and the space. People are still talking about how much fun they had. We will certainly be back and look forward to working with you again. I hope you enjoy this beautiful day!!
Thank you for everything! We had an amazing time and would definitely do it again! All of the staff was super attentive and accommodating. Thank you again!
We had a great time! Thank you so much for everything! Everyone raved about your space and we had a fantastic time. Your staff was attentive and kind. Thank you!
It was great! Everyone enjoyed themselves and the food was great! I would also like to comment that the staff was A+.

questions.question: Do you have any restrictions with decorations?
questions.answer: You may bring decorations, however, we don't allow streamers, confetti or anything to be attached to the walls. Large decorations need to be taken at the end of the event.

questions.question: Does Guilderland location offer catering?
questions.answer: Our Guilderland location does not offer catering options but you are welcome to bring in outside food.

questions.question: Can the wing platters have multiple flavors?
questions.answer: Wing platters can be split into 2 flavors.

questions.question: Can we bring in cake/dessert?
questions.answer: Yes, we allow dessert to be brought in.

questions.question: Is gratuity added to our final bill?
questions.answer: Yes, a 15% gratuity and a 5% service fee for blocked time to set up and break down the party.

questions.question: Are linens and paper products provided?
questions.answer: Yes all of our locations provide cloth table covering, plates and silverware except Guilderland location.

questions.question: Can we arrive early to set up?
questions.answer: If you'd like guaranteed time to decorate we suggest adding it to your booking.
